definitions.definition: A recital or a second performance; a repetition .

examples: The architect drafted several iterations of the floorplan before deciding on his final design.

definitions.definition: The use of repetition in a computer program, especially in the form of a loop .
A single repetition of the code within such a repetitive process.
examples: The code calculates the appropriate value at each iteration .

main_definition: A recital or a second performance; a repetition .
secondary_definitions: ( computing ) The use of repetition in a computer program, especially in the form of a loop .
( computing ) A single repetition of the code within such a repetitive process.
